casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Vonsa GRAHAM. No. 408P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 14, 2006. Nancy Reed Dunn, Assistant Attorney General, Thomas J. Keith, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th day of August 2006 by Defendant to Proceed in Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 14th day of December 2006."
